document.topic_text: 2wholeminutes Who We Are: We are an American family just trying to recover from the economic crash, engaged in the survival of humanity, and the protection of our Earth Mother. How We Roll: Our individual contributors will share their creativity and their 2wholesense on a multitude of issues, topics, and concerns. We will share dope content from other artists as well as entrepreneurial projects that pique our diverse interests. Goal: To create a micro-profit dynamic digital content company that will provide equity for our family and revenue to uplift other entrepreneurs within our local communities.
document.post: 2wholeminutes Who We Are: We are an American family just trying to recover from the economic crash, engaged in the survival of humanity, and the protection of our Earth Mother.
